text.div:
ContactUse

Location, type or status of telecommunications address indicating use

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/contact-use

CodeDisplayDefinitionv3 Map (AddressUse)v2 Map (0201)
home A communication contact at a home; attempted contacts for business purposes might intrude privacy and chances are one will contact family or other household members instead of the person one wishes to call. Typically used with urgent cases, or if no other contacts are available.=H>PRN
>ORN
>VHN
work An office contact. First choice for business related contacts during business hours.=WP~WPN
temp A temporary contact. The period can provide more detailed information.=TMP
old This contact is no longer in use (or was never correct, but retained for records).>OLD
>BAD
mobile A telecommunication device that moves and stays with its owner. May have characteristics of all other use codes, suitable for urgent matters, not the first choice for routine business.=MC~PRS

name: ContactUse
description: Location, type or status of telecommunications address indicating use

concept.definition: A communication contact at a home; attempted contacts for business purposes might intrude privacy and chances are one will contact family or other household members instead of the person one wishes to call. Typically used with urgent cases, or if no other contacts are available.
An office contact. First choice for business related contacts during business hours.
A temporary contact. The period can provide more detailed information.
This contact is no longer in use (or was never correct, but retained for records).
A telecommunication device that moves and stays with its owner. May have characteristics of all other use codes, suitable for urgent matters, not the first choice for routine business.
